thread.title: Bob Lancastle
thread.title_full: Euro Car Parts reviewed by Bob Lancastle

author: Bob Lancastle
title: Bob Lancastle
text:
Refund --Order Ref 111- 651711
Ordered anti freeze and a pair of headlight bulbs 48 hour delivery- anti freeze turned up but not the bulbs- told bulbs were to follow on invoice and was informed by three mails over three days that they would be delivered in a few days time and everything was on track- not wishing to drive a car with a duff headlight I cancelled my order for the bulbs and asked for a refund and purchased the bulbs elsewhere.
By ECP own admittance there was an unacceptable delay in me getting my refund, however, that has now gone through. This was dealt with in a friendly and professional manner by Farida Jivani who could not apologise enough for the inconvenience.
There are erasers on the end of pencils for a reason- mistakes happen!
Alls well that ends well!
Thank you
